# MedLEA <img src="hexsticker/sticker.png" align="right" height="200"/>

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The  MedLEA package provides morphological and structural features of  471 medicinal plant leaves.

## Installation

You can install the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("SMART-Research/MedLEA")
```
## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example1}
library(MedLEA)
data("medlea")
head(medlea)
```

## Composition by Shapes of Leaves

```{r example2, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(packrat)
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(ggplot2)
library(viridis)

d11 <- as.data.frame(table(medlea$Shape))
names(d11) <- c('Shape_of_the_leaf', 'No_of_leaves')

ggplot(d11, aes(x= reorder(Shape_of_the_leaf, No_of_leaves), y=No_of_leaves)) + labs(y="Number of leaves", x="Shape of the leaf") + geom_bar(stat = "identity", width = 0.6) + ggtitle("Composition of the Sample by the Shape Label") + coord_flip()

```
